glossentry.glossdef:
The extended software distribution aggregates all information required to fulfill the obligations when making available or transferring the software distribution. It covers the following elements:
The associated and effective license terms and notices of the individual components.
The source code of components if stipulated by the effective license.
For a component, which contains subcomponents the license of the component and the individual licenses of the subcomponents are effective.
Documentation including the bill of materials of all third-party components with appropriate license and notice information.
